{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.20638v1", "title": "Nilpotency, Solvability and Frattini Theory for Poisson algebras", "summary": "This paper shows that a Poisson algebra is nilpotent if and only if it is
both associative and Lie nilpotent and examines various properties of the
nilradical and the solvable radical. It introduces a basic Frattini theory for
dialgebras and then investigates a more detailed theory for Poisoon algebras.", "main_category": "math.RA", "categories": "math.RA,math.AG", "published": "2025-04-29T11:10:55Z"}
